scripts.dev: npm run pre-dev && concurrently "vite" "npm run dev:watcher"
scripts.lint-and-type-check-and-test: concurrently "npm run lint" "npm run type-check" "npm run test"
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm audit && npm run audit-dotnet && run-p type-check "build-only {@}" --
scripts.audit-dotnet:win32: powershell.exe -Command "$commandOutput = dotnet list package --vulnerable --include-transitive; if ($commandOutput.Contains('Severity') -or $commandOutput.Contains('severity')) { dotnet list package --vulnerable --include-transitive; exit 1 } else { exit 0 }"
scripts.audit-dotnet:nix:
#!/bin/bash

commandOutput=$(dotnet list package --vulnerable) && { echo "$commandOutput" | grep -E 'Severity|severity' && dotnet list package --vulnerable --include-transitive; } && exit 1 || exit 0
